HowRetainiWorks.title: How Retaini Works
HowRetainiWorks.description: Retaini allows your loyal customers to help grow your business â€“ by sharing a code, inviting friends, and earning rewards for loyalty.

1.title: Adding a Customer
1.description: Add a customer to the system by entering their name and email. Retaini will generate two QR codes: one for sharing with friends and another for customer identification. A welcome email with instructions on how to use the code and share referrals is automatically sent to the customer.

2.title: Customer Shares, New Visitor Arrives
2.description: An existing customer shares their QR code or invitation link with a friend. When a new visitor arrives and shows this code, you simply scan it. The system automatically identifies which customer shared the code and shows what the new visitor receives based on your set reward plan.

3.title: Reward Achieved
3.description: When the number of referrals reaches the set threshold, the referring customer is automatically added to the list of pending reward recipients. This will be clearly visible on the main dashboard. At the same time, a notification is sent to the customer reminding them of their pending reward.

4.title: Returning Registered Customer
4.description: When a customer returns, they can be easily identified in the system â€“ by scanning their personal identification QR code or searching by email. The system will show if the customer is eligible for a reward and how much is left until the next one. Mark the reward as given with a single click.
